```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)

require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```


## Map with Points
```{r, markers}

pal311 <- colorFactor(c("#d73027", "#1a9850"), c("no", "yes"))

pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "Purples",
  domain = city_temp$temperature)

leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.HOT") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = city_temp, lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, radius = 1.5, color =  ~pal(temperature)) %>%
  addLegend(position = "topright" , pal = pal, values = city_temp$temperature, title = "temperature?")


```



```{r, loading}
railway_data <- readOGR("./GBR_rails.shp", GDAL1_integer64_policy = TRUE)

leaflet(data = railway_data) %>%  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldTerrain", options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
  addPolylines(color = "purple")
```

```{r, loading}
railway_data <- readOGR("./GBR_adm2.shp", GDAL1_integer64_policy = TRUE)

leaflet(data = railway_data) %>%  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldTerrain", options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
```
